full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG DGRA LHA CHEN PO MTHU LDAN THA 'OG CHOS KYI RGYAL PO LA TSOGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL 'DOD DGU YID BZHIN DBANG GI RGYAL PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES CHOS SKYONG DGRA LHA CHEN PO MTHU LDAN THA 'OG CHOS KYI RGYAL PO LA TSOGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL 'DOD DGU YID BZHIN DBANG GI RGYAL PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DBUS MDZAD DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SHES RAB MCHOD DPON PA DGE TSUL NGAG DBANG LHA BTZUN PING THU AA HAS GSANG BDAG RDO RJE RNAMS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR, 'TSO MDZAD GU RU YO GI NOM CHE CHOS RJES SU MTA TI DHVA DZAS DGE RGYAS BSHAD SGRUB GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,LEGS SO, ,LEGS SO, ,)
